innhold.avsnitt: You are entitled to take annual leave (holiday) during your parental benefit period. You can choose between:

liste.punkt: applying to postpone your parental benefit period while you are on leave
taking annual leave at the same time as you receive parental benefit, in which case you do not need to inform NAV.

innhold.avsnitt: Use the parental leave planner to determine how you can postpone the parental benefit period when you take holidays.
